text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
The length of line $AB$ is equal to the length of line $BC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
The length of line $AB$ is equal to the length of line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
